PFC Perry landed at Omaha Beach 75 years ago on D-Day, where he fought, was wounded, became a POW and almost died before his release in April 1945. God bless PFC Perry and all those who fought on that day. May we never forget their sacrifice.

I had the pleasure of meeting PFC Alvin H. Perry of Lawrencburg on Friday as he received France’s highest distinction, the Legion of Honor award, from @cglacroix for his participation in the liberation of France. pic.twitter.com/EfbFLcTlKq – at Thomson-Hood Veterans Center
